root.name: Tower of Heaven
root.description: OverviewDeveloped by Askiisoft with music by Flashygoodness in 2009. It is a freeware title featuring 2D platforming with graphical restrictions similar to that of the Game Boy.StoryClimb the Tower of Heaven to have an audience with God.GameplayA 2D side-scrolling platformer where each stage features its own set of rules. For example, in one level, the player must only move towards the right; attempting to move left will kill the player.
